Evaluation of Search Time for Two Computerized Information Retrieval Systems at the University of Georgia .A Ware, Glenn O. .A Park, Margaret K. Two statistical models for estimating search time have been developed for the CA Condensates data base using the University of Georgia Text Search System.. Graphs showing the effect of data base size and number of search terms on search time are presented.. Comparative timings between the Chemical Abstracts Service search program and the University of Georgia search program are made for the CA Condensates data base.. .X 18	1	727 91	1	727 124	2	727 125	2	727 127	1	727 129	1	727 145	1	727 165	1	727 190	1	727 191	1	727 197	1	727 211	2	727 214	1	727 218	1	727 243	1	727 307	1	727 330	1	727 378	2	727 381	1	727 421	1	727 439	1	727 440	2	727 448	1	727 450	1	727 451	1	727 452	3	727 453	1	727 459	1	727 467	1	727 468	2	727 484	2	727 490	1	727 491	1	727 492	1	727 495	2	727 506	1	727 508	2	727 511	3	727 512	3	727 514	2	727 516	1	727 517	1	727 518	2	727 520	2	727 521	2	727 522	1	727 523	3	727 524	2	727 525	1	727 526	3	727 527	1	727 528	2	727 529	2	727 530	1	727 534	1	727 546	1	727 553	1	727 575	1	727 576	1	727 579	1	727 580	2	727 594	1	727 603	1	727 604	2	727 606	1	727 609	3	727 610	2	727 611	1	727 612	2	727 615	1	727 619	1	727 622	1	727 623	1	727 625	2	727 626	2	727 629	1	727 630	1	727 631	1	727 632	1	727 633	1	727 636	2	727 637	1	727 642	1	727 648	1	727 650	1	727 689	1	727 692	1	727 696	2	727 699	2	727 700	2	727 703	1	727 705	3	727 707	2	727 708	1	727 723	1	727 726	2	727 727	5	727 728	2	727 729	1	727 730	1	727 731	2	727 732	1	727 733	1	727 734	1	727 736	1	727 738	1	727 739	1	727 740	1	727 741	1	727 742	1	727 743	1	727 744	1	727 754	2	727 755	1	727 809	1	727 812	2	727 813	2	727 814	1	727 817	1	727 820	2	727 822	1	727 824	1	727 826	1	727 827	1	727 866	1	727 870	2	727 873	1	727 875	1	727 879	1	727 883	1	727 1004	1	727 1035	1	727 1072	1	727 1078	2	727 1089	2	727 1091	2	727 1143	1	727 1207	1	727 1264	2	727 1297	1	727 1298	1	727 1302	1	727 1303	3	727 1327	1	727 1356	1	727 1364	2	727 1366	2	727 1367	2	727 1368	3	727 1370	1	727 1372	1	727 1373	1	727 1374	1	727 1375	1	727 1376	1	727 1377	1	727 1396	2	727 1396	2	727
